allow: Bash(find src/pages -name "*.jsx" -type f -exec sh -c 'count=$(grep -c ""bg-dark-\|text-dark-"" ""$1"" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); [ ""$count"" = ""0"" ] && echo ""$1""' _ {} ;)
Bash(for file in organizer/OrganizerDashboard.jsx clubgm/ClubGMDashboard.jsx courtowner/CourtOwnerDashboard.jsx sponsor/SponsorDashboard.jsx)

Bash(do sed -i 's/text-purple-600/text-brand-accent/g; s/text-orange-600/text-brand-accent/g; s/text-red-600/text-brand-accent/g; s/text-indigo-600/text-brand-accent/g; s/text-green-600/text-brand-accent/g; s/text-blue-600/text-brand-accent/g; s/bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700/bg-brand-accent hover:bg-brand-accent-dark/g; s/bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700/bg-brand-accent hover:bg-brand-accent-dark/g; s/bg-purple-600 hover:bg-purple-700/bg-brand-accent hover:bg-brand-accent-dark/g; s/bg-orange-600 hover:bg-orange-700/bg-brand-accent hover:bg-brand-accent-dark/g' "$file")

Bash(for file in PlayerAchievements.jsx PlayerBookCourt.jsx PlayerBookTraining.jsx PlayerClubs.jsx PlayerEditProfile.jsx PlayerHistory.jsx PlayerJoinTournament.jsx PlayerNotifications.jsx PlayerProfile.jsx)
